transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Boliye.
Customer: Bataye, haan bataiye main Nitish baat kar raha hun, abhi baat ho raha tha sir aapse, ek call aa gaya tha.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Haan, kal hum DTS discuss kar lete hain aapse, theek hai?
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Dekhiye mera mera mera yeh cheez kehna hai, dekhiye us time bola gaya matlab ki lead verified hai, theek hai? Toh hum kya samjhenge? Ki agar usme inquiry aaya hai, theek hai?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Jaise inquiry hai, mera woh nahi kehna ki matlab woh jo customer jo inquiry kiya hai matlab woh sir aapka offline bhi business suniye aap, sir suniye meri baat, aap offline bhi business start karte honge, theek hai? Log agar aapko jaante nahi hai na jab tak, tab tak aapke paas nahi aate hain, main bata deta hun, theek hai? Yahan bhi online market hai.
Customer: Woh cheez hum kehna nahi chah rahe hain, aap kya hum jo bol rahe hain aap woh samajh nahi paa rahe hain.
Executive: Haan, hum samajh rahe hain.
Customer: Kya cheez samajh rahe hain aap bataiye, hum kya bole aapko?
Executive: Aap bol rahe hain ki mujhe verified lead hi chahiye.
Customer: Nahi, dekhiye verified pehle mera jo humra baat woh suniye, us time jis time paid service rehte hain na, us time bola gaya ki jo lead jo milega na toh woh verified hoga, theek hai? Yahan pe kahani khatam ho gaya, uske baad jo bhi customer customer search kiya, theek hai?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Theek hai, woh baat mante hain hum thoda der mein baat call kiye, theek hai? Yeh bhi hua, ya do minute ke baad yeh call kiye toh customer ka requirement pura ho gaya. Theek?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Yeh bhi yeh bhi problem solve yeh bhi koi problem nahi hai. Haan, theek hai isme bhi humko koi problem nahi hai, humko yeh cheez ka problem hai ki maan ke chaliye wahan pe dikhaya 5 minute pehle, theek? Haan, ki yeh lega humse school dress 200 piece, theek hai? Woh requirement requirement dala hua hai. Aur woh dekh raha hai ki 6 saal se usme IndiaMART pe woh matlab hai customer, theek hai? Yeh cheez bhi dekhiye, hum usko kya karenge call karenge, yahi hai na? Haan. Call kiye toh usko hum kya bolenge product ke bare mein apna samjhayenge. Theek hai? Aapka yahi kehna hai? Jab woh dikha raha hai ki pehle mera haan theek hai aap pehle mera baat sun lijiye uske baad boliyega. Theek hai school uniform woh, hum jab call kiye toh hum aap hum unko kya hai apne product ke bare mein samjhayenge ya baat karenge, theek hai? Ki aisa aisa aapka inquiry aaya hai. Yahi cheez hum bolenge? Haan. Toh wahan pe jab yeh uniform ka woh inquiry dale hue hain, theek hai? Woh bolte hain humko silai silai machine chahiye. Haan. Toh yeh yeh cheez bataiye. Sir, toh silai machine wali aap silai machine ki buylead hi aap consume nahi kijiye na. Woh yahi cheez aap bol rahe hain, theek hai wahan pe likha hua hai yeh uniform lega tab toh hum buylead consume kiye hain na? Yahi cheez toh ho raha hai na?
Executive: Kya kahin na kahin kahin na kahin unki kahin kahin requirement. Aap humko kya bolenge aap log? Ek ke saath hota toh maan ke chaliye ho sakta hai aisa theek hai koi mistake se kar diya thoda der ke liye. Ek minute ke liye hota toh chal sakta hai na? Hmm. Ek do ek do hoga aisa toh ho sakta hai, aaj bhi jo do lead consume kiye hain same condition hai, teen din pehle ka same condition hai, ek saptaah pehle ka condition same hai, hum kaise yeh karenge aap bataiye? Isko hum call karenge? Aapka koi aapka koi conversion nahi hua?
Customer: Nahi kuch conversion nahi hua.
Executive: Ek bhi conversion nahi?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Aapki rating bhi aayi hai.
Customer: Rating aayi hai? Haan Sitamarhi se rating bhi diye hain 3 November ko toh unse bhi conversion nahi hua? Nahi Nandlal Bhagat se ji se? Nahi unka bhi unka bhi chala hi raha hai, abhi hua nahi hai unse. Toh woh rating bhi diye hain aapko 3 November ko hi, aap dekh lijiye unka toh conversion aap toh abhi bol rahe hain ki koi genuine client hi nahi mila, abhi aap bol rahe hain ki unka baat chal raha hai mujhse humse. Toh sir kuch na kuch toh genuine client hai, aisa toh nahi hai na ki aapko kuch bhi requirement nahi mil rahi hai. Abhi aapki starting hai of.
Customer: Starting hai toh kab tak yeh problem solve hoga? Humko dekhiye hum sir business hai mera sir business hai hum bhi sir suniye business hai, theek hai? Humko mera yeh seedha kehna hai, theek hai? Humko agar wahan pe school uniform dikha raha hai ki school uniform toh hum call karenge toh us time uska requirement pura ho gaya ho, theek hai? Ya woh woh humko bolega silai machine chahiye, toh woh kaise hum jaanenge yeh hua? Yeh lead sare log ki sir sare log ki aisa thodi na problem hoga sir ki aapko uniform wala call kar raha hai bol raha hai silai machine. Hum hum kaise yeh karenge abhi bataiye. Sare log aisa bol rahe honge? Abhi bol rahe honge? Aadha ghanta bas. Toh hum aaj bhi do lead consume kiye toh wahi haal hai, ek saptaah pehle kiye toh wahi haal hai toh phir hum kaise yeh karenge aap bataiye? Yeh cheez toh hum yeh cheez us din bhi hum unko call kiye toh woh bole. Connect kar sakte hain aapke saath system se connect karke hum aapse discuss bhi kar lete hain ek ek buylead, theek hai? Theek hai? Haan haan. Theek hai. Theek. Theek hai okay. Ek aur chahiye iska.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving irrelevant buyleads.

- Customer is not getting any conversions.

- Customer is facing this issue repeatedly.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to connect with the system.

- Executive offered to discuss each buylead.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, conversion, uniform
